    • Constructor Detail

        @Autowired
public GameService​(BoardService boardService,

    • Method Detail

      • initGame

        public GameStatus initGame()
        Sets up the boards, players and the current GameStatus object for a new game. Assumes that the first move will be by Player 1.
        Returns:
        GameStatus object

      • isEndGame

        public boolean isEndGame()
        Called after every executeMove call. Returns true if game has ended; else false.

      • getGameWinner

        public Player getGameWinner()
        Called only if the game has ended. Collects the remaining stones from the board before checking for the player with higher stone count in their home.
        Returns:
        Player object with higher home-stone count. If the number of stones at both homes are equal, return empty player with ID PlayerID.None.

      • togglePlayer

        private Player togglePlayer​(Player currentPlayer)
        Returns Player object of player 1 if currentPlayer is player 2, and vice versa.

      • executeMove

        public GameStatus executeMove​(java.lang.String playerID,
                              int pitID)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                              java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Performs all the necessary validations and performs all steps necessary to execute a move. This is the entry point for clients to make a move request.
        Parameters:
        playerID - String {PLAYER_1, PLAYER_2}
        pitID - [0, 13]
        Returns:
        GameStatus object after executing the current move, if everything is valid
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
